mapper.insert: insert into hotel (h_num, h_p_count, h_price, h_name, h_type, h_star, h_address, h_d_address, h_img, h_latitude, h_longitude) values (hotel_seq.nextval, #{h_p_count}, #{h_price}, #{h_name}, #{h_type}, #{h_star}, #{h_address}, #{h_d_address}, #{h_img}, #{h_latitude}, #{h_longitude} )
mapper.update: update hotel set h_name=#{h_name}, h_star=#{h_star}, where h_num = #{h_num}
